# Tic Tac Toe Game (React JS)

<a href="https://grione.github.io/game-tic-tac-toe/" target="_blank">Check The Live Demo</a>

![Tic-tac-toe screenshot](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/35578611/334856171-5c15eaee-e279-4381-a8e7-91d076161265.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..ANPSzsvMivGduImtbSeKMjxlv4y1Pi6MXii8wcGZru4)

## Description

This project is a classic Tic Tac Toe game implemented using React. It is an educational project for practicing UI development and state management with React.

## Stack
- React JS
- HTML5
- CSS
- Vite

## Features
- It is possible to enter the names of the players
- The game takes into account the tied score
- Output of simple logs

## How to run locally
- install dependencies
``` npm install ```
- start local server via Vite
``` npm start dev ```
